title: 5G service is here, but do you really need to get it a 5G phone now? - Quora

response.answer_text: I work for a telecommunications company, and all but two of the recommended handsets for our staff are not 5G capable. I just upgraded to a non 5G capable handset, and figure when I upgrade again in late 2021, maybe there will be 5G coverage where I work, live, and hang out most of the time.
